meta.name: description
meta.content: GREENFIELD UNION SCHOOL DISTRICT is a student centered district dedicated to preparing each student for a life which is productive academically, physically, socially, emotionally and economically.

article.div: This page has information and resources related to the district-wide closure of schools. / Esta página contiene información y recursos relacionados con el cierre de escuelas en todo el distrito

h1.a: Revised Bus Routes / Rutas de Autobús Revisadas (4-27-2020)

div.div: GREENFIELD UNION SCHOOL DISTRICT is a student centered district dedicated to preparing each student for a life which is productive academically, physically, socially, emotionally and economically.

br.p: The Greenfield Union School District prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation, and bullying based on actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender identity, gender, gender expression, nationality, race or ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, marital or parental status or association with a person or a group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. Title IX Coordinator: Lucas Hogue, Greenfield Union School District Office
